titleStmt.title: A sermon on the parable of the sower, taken out of the 13. of Mathew. Preached at London by M. G. Gifford, & published at the request of sundrie godly and well disposed persons
titleStmt.author: Gifford, George, d. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By T. East] for Tobie Cooke, dwelling at the Tigres head in Paules Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Tigres head in Paules Churchyard
